title: Fixed more test that were flickering on the Travis CI build
body:
### Motivation

Fixed more test that were flickering on the Travis CI build.
### Modifications
- Disabled code coverage on every build
- Changed timeout test to serialize execution into main thread
### Result

Travis build has been consistently passing

title: Fixed incorrect links
body:
### Motivation

Documentation links were broken.
Added "./" to fix the link
### Modifications

Modified links in README.md
### Result

After your change, what will change.

Fixed incorrect links for Getting Started, Architecture and Documentation Index.

title: Added configuration to upload binaries to maven-central
body:
### Motivation

We need to automatically push release binaries to sonatype to be included in central maven repository.

Current release v1.14 already pushed manually and available.

repo.name: pulsar
repo.description: Apache Pulsar - distributed pub-sub messaging system

title: Support Topic lookup using Pulsar binary protocol
body:
### Motivation

To improve lookup performance: adding lookup API in Pulsar binary protocol for: 
- PartitionedTopicMetadata 
- Topic-lookup: find BrokerService-Url  
### Modifications
- Introduced two new protobuf-commands for partitionedMetadata and topic lookup
- server/client api to handle lookup request/response
### Result

Result: Client-library can do topic-lookup using pulsar binary protocol.

labels.name: type/enhancement
labels.description: The enhancements for the existing features or docs. e.g. reduce memory usage of the delayed messages
